mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS (name, email, password, phone, provider) VALUES (#{name}, #{email}, #{password}, #{phone}, #{provider})
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, email, password, phone, created_at, updated_at, provider, provider_id FROM USERS WHERE id = #{id}
